class.name: Tree
class.brief_description: Control to show a tree of items.

method.name: are_column_titles_visible
method.description: Get whether the column titles are being shown.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clear the tree. This erases all of the items.

method.name: create_item
method.description: Create an item in the tree and add it as the last child of [code]parent[/code]. If parent is not given, it will be added as the last child of the root, or it'll the be the root itself if the tree is empty.

method.name: ensure_cursor_is_visible
method.description: Make the current selected item visible. This will scroll the tree to make sure the selected item is in sight.

method.name: get_allow_rmb_select
method.description: Get whether a right click can select items.

method.name: get_column_at_pos
method.description: Get the column index under the given point.

method.name: get_column_title
method.description: Get the title of the given column.

method.name: get_column_width
method.description: Get the width of the given column in pixels.

method.name: get_columns
method.description: Get the amount of columns.

method.name: get_custom_popup_rect
method.description: Get the rectangle for custom popups. Helper to create custom cell controls that display a popup. See [method TreeItem.set_cell_mode].

method.name: get_drop_mode_flags
method.description: Get the flags of the current drop mode.

method.name: get_edited
method.description: Get the current edited item. This is only available for custom cell mode.

method.name: get_edited_column
method.description: Get the column of the cell for the current edited icon. This is only available for custom cell mode.

method.name: get_item_area_rect
method.description: Get the rectangle area of the the specified item. If column is specified, only get the position and size of that column, otherwise get the rectangle containing all columns.

method.name: get_item_at_pos
method.description: Get the tree item at the specified position (relative to the tree origin position).

method.name: get_next_selected
method.description: Get the next selected item after the given one.

method.name: get_pressed_button
method.description: Get the index of the last pressed button.

method.name: get_root
method.description: Get the root item of the tree.

method.name: get_scroll
method.description: Get the current scrolling position.

method.name: get_selected
method.description: Get the currently selected item.

method.name: get_selected_column
method.description: Get the column number of the current selection.

method.name: is_folding_hidden
method.description: Get whether the folding arrow is hidden.

method.name: set_allow_rmb_select
method.description: Set whether or not a right mouse button click can select items.

method.name: set_column_expand
method.description: Set whether a column will have the "Expand" flag of [Control].

method.name: set_column_min_width
method.description: Set the minimum width of a column.

method.name: set_column_title
method.description: Set the title of a column.

method.name: set_column_titles_visible
method.description: Set whether the column titles visibility.

method.name: set_columns
method.description: Set the amount of columns.

method.name: set_drop_mode_flags
method.description: Set the drop mode as an OR combination of flags. See [code]DROP_MODE_*[/code] constants.

method.name: set_hide_folding
method.description: Set whether the folding arrow should be hidden.

method.name: set_hide_root
method.description: Set whether the root of the tree should be hidden.

method.name: set_select_mode
method.description: Set the selection mode. Use one of the [code]SELECT_*[/code] constants.

signal.name: button_pressed
signal.description: Emitted when a button on the tree was pressed (see [method TreeItem.add_button]).

signal.name: cell_selected
signal.description: Emitted when a cell is selected.

signal.name: custom_popup_edited
signal.description: Emitted when a cell with the [code]CELL_MODE_CUSTOM[/code] is clicked to be edited.

signal.name: empty_tree_rmb_selected
signal.description: Emitted when the right mouse button is pressed if RMB selection is active and the tree is empty.

signal.name: item_activated
signal.description: Emitted when an item is activated (double-clicked).

signal.name: item_collapsed
signal.description: Emitted when an item is collapsed by a click on the folding arrow.

signal.name: item_edited
signal.description: Emitted when an item is editted.

signal.name: item_rmb_selected
signal.description: Emitted when an item is selected with right mouse button.

signal.name: item_selected
signal.description: Emitted when an item is selected with right mouse button.
